content: wwwwaaaatttteeeerrrrmmmmeeeelllloooonnnn ccccooooaaaasssstttteeeerrrr © 2009 samantha farrell http //on-hooks-and-needles blogspot com hook size h yarn less than 1 skein each lily sugar n cream or any other 100% cotton yarn in red green white and black project finished size ~4 ½ diameter gauge not really important adjust your hook size or yarn to get the size you want pattern notes to change color work last double_crochet of first color until 2 loops remain on the hook yarn over with second color draw second color through to complete double_crochet drop first color to back of coaster and carry across working over unused color to hide it colors will be dropped and picked up throughout the 3rd round pattern with red yarn chain 4 join to make ring round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 7 double_crochet in ring join to 3rd chain 8 double_crochet stitches round 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in last double_crochet join to third chain 16 double_crochet stitches round 3 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet change to black yarn black 1 double_crochet in same double_crochet *change to red red 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet black 1 double_crochet in same double_crochet repeat from * 6 times change to red red 1 double_crochet in last double_crochet join to third chain 32 double_crochet stitches 8 black 24 red you will end the round with red on the hook drop black yarn completely cut and leave enough length to weave in ends round 4 with red yarn chain 1 single_crochet in same double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next black double_crochet *1 single_crochet in next 3 red double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next black double_crochet repeat from * 6 times 1 single_crochet in last red double_crochet join to first single_crochet of round 40 single_crochet stitches fasten_off round 5 join white yarn to any red single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in same red single_crochet single_crochet in each red single_crochet around join to first white single_crochet of round 40 single_crochet stitches fasten_off round 6 join green yarn to any white single_crochet chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 white single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next white single_crochet *half_double_crochet in next 3 white single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next white single_crochet repeat from * 8 times join to first green half_double_crochet of round 50 single_crochet stitches fasten_off finishing weave in all ends block if necessary add frosty cold beverage and enjoy copyright information
